data.trans: Có dính líu đến (tội, hành vi phạm pháp)
data.trans_hint: Thanh niên ở khu vực này thường hay dính líu đến trộm cắp.
data.en_hint: Youngsters in this area often get mixed up in robberies.
data.content_game_1: Youngsters in this area often get mixed up in robberies.
data.answer_en_hint: Youngsters in this area often get mixed up in robberies.

data.trans_hint: Sau 2 tháng điều tra, chủ tịch thành phố đã được chứng minh vô tội.
data.en_hint: After 2 months of investigation, the city president has been proved to be in the clear.
data.content_game_1: After 2 months of investigation, the city president has been proved to be in the clear.
data.answer_en_hint: After 2 months of investigation, the city president has been proved to be in the clear.

data.trans_hint: Chính gã tồi đó đã xúi giục cậu bé ăn cắp đồ của các hộ gia đình trong vùng.
data.en_hint: The bad guy led the boy on stealing items from households in the neighborhood.
data.content_game_1: The bad guy led the boy on stealing items from households in the neighborhood.
data.answer_en_hint: The bad guy led the boy on stealing items from households in the neighborhood.

data.trans_hint: Chính sự thiếu chăm sóc của cha mẹ đã dẫn đến tội ác của cậu ta.
data.en_hint: Lack of parental care led to his crime.
data.content_game_1: Lack of parental care led to his crime.
data.answer_en_hint: Lack of parental care led to his crime.

data.trans_hint: Mặc dù có hành vi sai trái vô cùng nghiêm trọng, họ vẫn bỏ quá và tha cho hắn ta.
data.en_hint: Despite his serious wrongdoing, they still make allowances for him and let him off.
data.content_game_1: Despite his serious wrongdoing, they still make allowances for him and let him off.
data.answer_en_hint: Despite his serious wrongdoing, they still make allowances for him and let him off.

data.trans_hint: Tỉ lệ tội phạm trong thành phố ngày càng tăng dạo gần đây nên an ninh cần phải được thắt chặt hơn nữa.
data.en_hint: The crime rate in the city has been on the up lately so security needs to be beefed up.
data.content_game_1: The crime rate in the city has been on the up lately so security needs to be beefed up.
data.answer_en_hint: The crime rate in the city has been on the up lately so security needs to be beefed up.

data.trans: Chuyển dịch dần sang sử dụng thứ gì
data.trans_hint: Họ đang chuyển dịch dần sang sử dụng hình thức tiêm thuốc độc đối với tội tử hình vài năm qua.
data.en_hint: They have been phasing poisonous injections in for death penalty for the past few years.
data.content_game_1: They have been phasing poisonous injections in for death penalty for the past few years.
data.answer_en_hint: They have been phasing poisonous injections in for death penalty for the past few years.

data.trans: Dần dần thôi không còn sử dụng thứ gì nữa
data.trans_hint: Cảnh sát ở thành phố này đã bắt đầu dần dần thôi sử dụng còng tay.
data.en_hint: The police in the city started to phase handcuffs out.
data.content_game_1: The police in the city started to phase handcuffs out.
data.answer_en_hint: The police in the city started to phase handcuffs out.

data.trans_hint: Họ đồng ý buộc tội anh ta nếu gia đình anh ta không thể bồi thường thiệt hại cho họ.
data.en_hint: They agreed to press charges against him if his family couldn't compensate for their damages.
data.content_game_1: They agreed to press charges against him if his family couldn't compensate for their damages.
data.answer_en_hint: They agreed to press charges against him if his family couldn't compensate for their damages.

data.trans_hint: Con phải tránh xa ma túy bằng mọi giá.
data.en_hint: You have to stay away from drugs at all cost.
data.content_game_1: You have to stay away from drugs at all cost.
data.answer_en_hint: You have to stay away from drugs at all cost.

data.trans_hint: Chính phủ cần thắt chặt hơn nữa việc giết thịt chó.
data.en_hint: The government needs to tighten dog slaughter up.
data.content_game_1: The government needs to tighten dog slaughter up.
data.answer_en_hint: The government needs to tighten dog slaughter up.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đã mách với cảnh sát tất cả những việc làm sai trái gã giám đốc đã làm ở công ty.
data.en_hint: She tipped the police off about all the misdeeds the manager did in the company.
data.content_game_1: She tipped the police off about all the misdeeds the manager did in the company.
data.answer_en_hint: She tipped the police off about all the misdeeds the manager did in the company.
